author: Rageoftheage
body:
Semis got hit really hard

Stocks: AMAT, NVDA, TSM, LSCC, LCRX, INTC, AVGO, NXPI, TXN

ETF: SMH

author: xlynx
body: No, I meant ARM, the processor architecture family. Within this, there are competing ARM architectures from licencees like APPL, QCOM, MTSI, STM, SMSN, MCHP, AVGO, XLNX, TXN, NXP, NVDA, MRVL. Most of these are scaling down for embedded microcontrollers. But some, like APPL, QCOM, NVDA, MRVL are scaling up for laptops, desktops, and servers.

author: how_you_feel
body:
Thanks, Bingo! https://i.imgur.com/QEvw41t.png

I wasn't aware of NXP Semiconductors. Akamai too.

author: duncsharp
body:
Thanks. Yea I only risked a small amount as I knew I didn't know what I was doing! 
Yes best avoided. I'm using motley fool stock advisor and reading alot. 

Current stock picks are
ANET / PG&E / PayPal / GLUU / CAH / ATVI / FNF / I TV / ARCC / SNPS / CSCO / BTI / ADNT 

All bought over the last ten days as I've only just started.
